  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add(GameUser user, String associationType, Entity e)
      Add a named association between a user and some other entity (item, user, account)
      Parameters:
      user - Key user with the association
      associationType - Tag for the association
      e - Other entity being associated with
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if not

    • add

      public boolean add(GameUser user, String associationType, double val)
      Add a named association between a user and a value
      Parameters:
      user - Key user with the association
      associationType - Tag for the association
      val - Number to be associated with the user
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if not

    • add

      public boolean add(GameUser user, String associationType, String info)
      Add a named association between a user and a string (up to 80 characters)
      Parameters:
      user - Key user with the association
      associationType - Tag for the association
      info - String to be associated with the user
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if not

    • add

      public boolean add(GameUser user, String associationType)
      Add a named association between a user and nothing
      Parameters:
      user - Key user with the association
      associationType - Tag for the association
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if not

    • add

      public boolean add(GameUser user, String associationType, Entity e, double val, String info)
      Add a named association between a user and some other values
      Parameters:
      user - Key user with the association
      associationType - Tag for the association
      e - Other entity being associated with (null if none)
      val - Number to be associated with the user (Double.Nan if none)
      info - String to be associated with the user (null if none)
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if not

    • remove

      public boolean remove(GameUser user, String associationType)
      Remove the association the given user has with the given tag name
      Parameters:
      user - User with the association
      associationType - Tag for the association being removed
      Returns:
      true if found and successfully removed, false otherwise

    • get

      public Collection<UserAssociation> get(String associationType)
      Returns a collection of all user associations with the given tag
      Parameters:
      associationType - Tag for the association "type"
      Returns:
      Collection of UserAssociations with that tag, or an empty collection if tag not present

    • get

      public UserAssociation get(GameUser user, String associationType)
      Returns the unique association of the given user an the given tag
      Parameters:
      user - User with the association
      associationType - Tag or "type" of the association
      Returns:
      full UserAssocation information for the association, or null if it doesn't exist

    • getAll

      public Map<String,? extends Map<Integer,UserAssociation>> getAll()
      Returns all associations
      Returns:
      a nested map of all associations, indexed first by tag, then by User ID

    • refresh

      public void refresh(BulletZoneData bzData, List<? extends EntityRepository> repos, GameUserRepository gameUserRepo)
      Reads the database and fills the HashMaps as appropriate. Intended to be called once at time of initialization.
      Parameters:
      bzData - reference to BulletZoneData for making further SQL queries
      repos - List of repositories of entities that can be owned
      gameUserRepo - repository of users that can have associations
